    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2699</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">An animation of the formation of the Himalayan mountains</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine Animation der Anordnung der Himalajaberge</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une animation de la formation des montagnes de 
l'Himalaya</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um animation da formação das montanhas 
himalayan</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Una animazione della formazione delle montagne 
himalayan</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια ζωτικότητα του σχηματισμού των βουνών Himalayan</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una animación de la formación de las montañas 
himalayan</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">An animation which demonstrates how the Indian tectonic plate moved under the Eurasian plate resulting in a collision and the n the formation of the Himalayan mountains</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">tectonic plates</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">mountains</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine Animation, die zeigt, wie die indische 
tectonic Platte unter die eurasische Platte bewog, resultierend in 
einem Zusammenstoß und im n die Anordnung der Himalajaberge</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une animation qui démontre comment le plat 
tectonique indien s'est déplacé sous le plat eurasien ayant pour 
résultat une collision et le n la formation des montagnes de 
l'Himalaya</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um animation que demonstre como a placa tectonic 
indian se moveu sob a placa eurasian tendo por resultado uma colisão 
e o n a formação das montanhas himalayan</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Una animazione che dimostra come la piastra 
tettonica indiana si è mossa sotto la piastra eurasian con 
conseguente scontro e n la formazione delle montagne himalayan</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια ζωτικότητα που καταδεικνύει πώς το ινδικό 
τεκτονικό πιάτο κίνησε κάτω από το ευρασιατικό πιάτο με 
συνέπεια μια σύγκρουση και το ν το σχηματισμό των βουνών 
Himalayan</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una animación que demuestra cómo la placa 
tectónica india se movió bajo la placa eurasiática dando por 
resultado una colisión y la n la formación de las montañas 
himalayan</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">tectonic Platten</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Berge</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">plats tectoniques</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">montagnes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">placas tectonic</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">montanhas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">piastre tettoniche</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">montagne</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">τεκτονικά πιάτα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">βουνά</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">placas tectónicas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">montañas</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
